code: import{headersFormData}from"../../../../../../helpers/headers-form-data";import{apiUrl}from"../../../../../../helpers/api-url";import{handleResponse}from"../../../../../../helpers/handle-response";export var apiCalls={getPizzas:getPizzas,addPizza:addPizza};function getPizzas(){var requestUrl="".concat(apiUrl,"pizzas");var requestOptions={method:"GET",headersFormData:headersFormData};return fetch(requestUrl,requestOptions).then(function(response){return response.json();});}function addPizza(formValues){var formData=new FormData();console.log(formValues);formData.append("quantity",formValues.quantity);formData.append("price",formValues.price);formData.append("id",formValues.id);formData.append("pizza_id",formValues.pizza_id);console.log(formValues);var requestUrl="".concat(apiUrl,"pizzas");var requestOptions={method:"POST",headersFormData:headersFormData,body:formData};return fetch(requestUrl,requestOptions).then(function(response){return response.json();});}
